replies.body:
TIMELESS REMINDER:
We still want a tab that shows **"SKINS OWNED"**.
Either directly in the Store or in the client under the Summoner Profile.
Please @Riot. What is the holdup on this one?
It's likely a thing for the new client.

I think they could still put in something before the new client comes out. They updated the visual of the store this patch which is pretty similar to how it's going to look in the updated client. So, why not add a "Skins Owned" tab?

Priorities. The Shop update is an integral part of the client update.
I am in favor of an Owned Skins tab, but the new client has 10000% higher priority right now. I would rather they shove all available client asset resources into the new client, instead of needing to work it into the existing and needing to alter it for the new client.

Get the new client, then work on filling it up with all these things players have been wishing for.

Don't buy your furniture untill the house is built.
We still need the Champion quotes fixed when someone picks them in queue.

This was removed from the game by rito so people could clearly hear when it was their turn to pick, Riot even said that dodge percentage dropped after they made the change. They most likely will not be bringing this back
I'd kind of like to have it an option, though
Same.  I totally agree with Riot removing it for any reason but they should at least make it an option for those who don't have that issue.
they're not doing much more work on the current client since they're building a new one from scratch. It might be there, it might not.
Just out of curiosity, what purpose would a skins owned tab serve, do people forget what skins they already own or something?

every once in a while i wanna go through all the in game content i purchased.
its like browsing your wardrobe.
Except that riot says this:
"Sorry man, we know you paid for there clothes and you can look at them, but you have to first go to elophant because we gave them the key to your closet.
If you want to look at the stuff you bought in riots own client, we can only show you your clothes one category at a time.
what do you wanna see first, pants or shirts?"

> Pool Party Lulu's W - Polymorph victims now properly identify themselves as Seals in chat, rather than Cupcakes

i'm glad that rito is making a step towards proper identifications.

I myself sexually identify as a seal so when i see seals being identified as cupcakes it makes me cry inside. Some people call me dumb but I always thought this was important. I've cut off my arms and am having flippers surgically implanted into my body. I would like everyone to respect my right to swim the way I please and if you don't then you are a sealiphobe and need to check your ocean privileges.

You might want to lay off the tumblr

Also, how did you type this without arms?

> [{quoted}](name=King of Random,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=x27gEYQZ,comment-id=001e0003,timestamp=2016-04-20T03:17:04.405+0000)
>
> Also, how did you type this without arms?

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Next thing you know, Azir will want to build a wall ... owait
The 11 new splash arts look amazing! I wonder if Rito will ever remake Fizz splash. {{champion:105}}
They will remake it when he is fun to play against.
So never then

To be honest, the Grasp of the Undying and Frozen Gauntlet changes are laughable. They’re going to do next to nothing to solve the "everyone's a tank" problem. The Ekko nerfs will certainly help, but he wasn't the only person abusing the tank items/masteries. Frozen Gauntlet should've had its tank stats targetted; not its offensive stats (that's hurting builds like Blue Ezreal more than the tanks). Grasp of the Undying's change is going to be virtually negligible. And, finally, Sunfire Cape goes untouched. This is a pretty sad attempt at solving an annoyingly oppressive meta problem. (Not to mention the continued ignorance of the Guinsoo's Rageblade problem... even after Rageblade Tristana showed up in the LCS.)
*Iceborn Gauntlet... Can never get that item's name right.
{{item:3110}} Frozen Heart, {{item:3022}} Frozen Mallet, {{item:3025}} Fro--Iceborn Gauntlet...

Yes, they should just rename them all Iceborn <item>. Also, folks, we need an Iceborn event. Imagine hordes of over-empowered minions (with these items) and the goal is too defend against waves. It would be pretty cool. Kind of like a one-way moba. And the boss at the end can be a kind of Ascendent Lissandra. And if you achieve certain bonuses, you get like a super Ashe for a while.

Just random thoughts. Focus on the one-way moba aspect.
You mean, tower defense?
Supposedly, Devourer and Rageblade are both on the list of things they're going to be heavily adjusting at some point in the future, but that's all the information we've got.

Someone asked:

"Will there still be Devourer and Guinsoo change at patch 6.9 ?

Sorry to ask, but I really want to know since you mentioned it earlier on [state of the season]"



Meddler replied:

"Yes. Devourer's being replaced with something fairly similar to the old Madred's Bloodrazor. The double hit passive's then being shifted to Rage Blade at max stacks. Rageblade's being made more expensive and harder to stacks as a result."
Triforce Ez may make it's return if the IBG nerf hits hard enough.
or more like Ez will die back out of the meta again.
Increasing the shred on caustic spittle isn't going to fix the fact that the ability is fucking useless

Agreed.

Honestly, despite it being "powerful" (it's a defense-shred, meaning his allies benefit from it too), it doesn't FEEL powerful to the Kog'Maw player.

I'd suggest that Riot keep the thematic (more damage for Kog'Maw) but make it more user-rewarding. For example:

_**Caustic Spittle**_ - Hit enemy with skillshot. For the next 'x' seconds, the target will take 'x'% extra damage from Kog'maw. If Kog'Maw lands 5 autos on the target before the debuff wears off, they will be slowed by 'x' amount for 1 second. 

Just, something that's a little more rewarding to use, Riot.

It's actually very useful for winning early trades and possible early kills, something that needs to happen for Kog to get to his rapid fire turret mode. Also, it helps a ton against tanks and allows Kog to just build more dmg, instead of armor pen items.

It's actually not cause in every situation void ooze is better at winning early trades and kills cause of how valuable the slow is also if you're building armor pen on Kog you have already fucked up so hard that not even I can save you my sweet summer child.
New Evelyn looks so sexy{{champion:28}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:28}}
We want the skins splash art too! {{champion:28}}

We are nearly halfway through the season, and for many of us, it is still Preseason, because you continue to refuse to release Pure Solo Queue.

Whoever is involved in the decision to continue to delay Pure Solo Queue are bad people and should feel bad for doing so.
They'd rather have one functioning queue over two non functioning queues.
Where is this mythical funcioning queue?
I would like to know as well after my 30 minute wait time yesterday for bot/mid.
Then how would they fill the open spots in dynamic queue? And also the wait times would be even longer I can already go make  a sand which and watch an episode of TV before I find a match

I have to say, having just read the 6.8 patch notes and not seeing a mention of Mac is upsetting...  It seems that any sort of store or skin related thread will get an immediate response, yet i scour Riot responses to find anything related to Mac.  Unfortunately I guess I still won't be able to play, as has been the case for 3+ weeks.  I would appreciate some communication, please.
i was hoping to find a bugfix for the audio garbling on mac client. keep baylieving.
Bring champion mastery to 3v3 games. How can you earn champ mastery on legend of the poro king, but not 3v3s? Straight BS
It's like Ekko is being rewarded for breaking the rules by making him better at being an assassin because he was too good at being a tank. I don't like this.

Actually, he was too weak as an assassin. So they buffed him. Which made him an okay assassin and an amazing tank. So they nerfed his base stats and buffed some scalings - so now he's (hopefully, as was intended) a better assassin than tank.

Look at Helmet Bro getting it on with {{champion:28}} in her new splash Art

Also, I'm outrageously excited for the new {{champion:44}}  to come out
Have a part somewhere on the client that shows the ping, that way we can tell if we're gonna lag or not in game.
So what are you guys looking froward to the most: Taric rework going live? Diana finally getting another skin? Or the Mage update that coming soon?
Outrageously excited to see the new Taric, and I can't wait for the mage update, but I'm a little skeptical about how it's going to affect some of my favorite champions (Cass and Vlad, mainly).

"Zed no longer gains 20 extra attack damage when activating W - Living Shadow"
just how long has this been going on rito?
New rammus splash is ok{{champion:33}} rammus joke
Oh my goodness. Can I just have this patch already? The hype for the taric rework is real. {{item:3070}}
